subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Martin Kaymer made nine birdies over his last 12 holes and closed with a nine-under-par 63 to win the HSBC Champions in Shanghai for the biggest comeback in a World Golf Championship event.
snippet: Martin Kaymer made nine birdies over his last 12 holes and closed with a nine-under-par 63 to win the HSBC Champions in Shanghai for the biggest comeback in a World Golf Championship event.
